thread.title: Turning Your Hobby Into a Business: Twig
thread.title_full: Turning Your Hobby Into a Business: Twig

author: Investopedia
title: Turning Your Hobby Into a Business: Twig
text:
Loading the player... TWIG TERRARIUMS 
When two best friends met up after an 8 year separation, their arts and crafts night quickly turned into a lucrative small business loved by movie stars and locals alike. Twig Terrariums co-founders Michelle Inciarrano and Katy Maslow started in a rented garage, and now occupy a 3,000 sq. foot studio featuring terrariums ranging from a sheep-strewn bucolic paradise to a CSI-style crime scene investigation. 
Want your own terrarium? Visit: http://twigterrariums.com
